name: EGGS AFFECT
description:
EGGS AFFECT is the easy, small, joke / parody game about easter egg smashing.

It's a story about a Hero, Villains and endless Space!

The game is based on an old Slavic tradition, on the holiday of Easter, to battle on chicken eggs. The battle is between two players by smashing the chicken egg of one player on the egg of the other player. The person whose egg is broken as a consequence of the smash - loses.

Our game is very Easter-themed and we had planned to release our game just in time for Easter, but due to the pandemic, things got really pushed back on schedule. So before you watch the game, we will have one small request. Since the game is festive and fun. It is very important to be in a festive mood.Try to imagine your spirit on the Easter holiday. When there are a lot of festively decorated eggs around you. Eggs are literally everywhere on the table and in the yard and on TV.

Wishing you exciting adventures in the World of EGGS AFFECT!
